channel.title: CVE Feed for Repute InfoSystems -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Repute InfoSystems -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-32948|2024-04-24T07:03:17.452Z -- Repute Infosystems -- ARMember
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Repute Infosystems ARMember.This issue affects ARMember: from n/a through 4.0.28.

item.title: CVE-2024-27995|2024-03-21T15:00:59.052Z -- Repute Infosystems -- ARMember – Membership Plugin, Content Restriction, Member Levels, User Profile & User signup
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Repute Infosystems ARMember – Membership Plugin, Content Restriction, Member Levels, User Profile & User signup allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ARMember – Membership Plugin, Content Restriction, Member Levels, User Profile & User signup: from n/a through 4.0.23.

item.title: CVE-2024-30222|2024-03-28T05:05:42.156Z -- Repute Infosystems -- ARMember
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in Repute Infosystems ARMember.This issue affects ARMember: from n/a through 4.0.26.

item.title: CVE-2024-30223|2024-03-28T05:04:13.840Z -- Repute Infosystems -- ARMember
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in Repute Infosystems ARMember.This issue affects ARMember: from n/a through 4.0.26.

item.title: CVE-2024-31272|2024-04-12T12:38:41.213Z -- Repute InfoSystems -- ARForms Form Builder
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Repute InfoSystems ARForms Form Builder.This issue affects ARForms Form Builder: from n/a through 1.6.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-31296|2024-04-07T18:07:00.960Z -- Repute Infosystems -- BookingPress
item.description: Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key vulnerability in Repute Infosystems BookingPress.This issue affects BookingPress: from n/a through 1.0.81.

item.title: CVE-2024-31270|2024-05-08T13:25:37.157Z -- Repute InfoSystems -- ARForms Form Builder
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Repute InfoSystems ARForms Form Builder.This issue affects ARForms Form Builder: from n/a through 1.6.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-47837|2024-06-04T10:10:14.075Z -- Repute Infosystems -- ARMember
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in Repute Infosystems ARMember allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects ARMember: from n/a through 4.0.10.
